title: Chicken tagine with preserved lemons
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '3 cloves garlic', '2 onions', '1 bunch coriander', '1 bunch parsley', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 lemon', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste', '1 tablespoon sweet paprika', '1 saffron thread', '1 preserved lemon, sliced', 'green olives']
